title: My other account has been stuck in server transfer status for over 12 hours...
body:
Cmon... I have been checking once every half hour for 12 hours.. This is kinda too much even for Riot. The account that is transfering to NA is from LAN 
ign: germo.

please make sure my account gets transferred over. I am unable to log on any of the boards as well on that account because i am in some sort of riot server limbo status.. Plz

replies.body: Transfers have been having some issues today, and was disabled for a bit today.  It actually **just **came back up, and the weather looks clear to transfer.  I don't see anything pending on the summoner you provided, though.  You may need to try transferring again now that it's back up.  Hope that helps!

But i cant even log on the account to do anything. When i try to log in on LAN on it it says transfer successful try the new server. But when i try on NA it says transferring still taking place, try again in 5 mins. That was 14 hours ago now lol..

Did you fix it? I'm hav√≠ng the same problem on my main account, from EUNE to EUW. It's truly driving me crazy and mad. I CAN'T EVEN LOGIN TO SEE IF THEY RESPONDED TO MY TICKET! If they don't fix this, especially after i paid 20 Euros to transfer, I'm honestly giving up on this game. Not about to restart all over again.
No im still stuck, cant even get on my account. im pissed

But i cant even log on the account to do anything. When i try to log in on LAN on it it says transfer successful try the new server. But when i try on NA it says transferring still taking place, try again in 5 mins. That was 14 hours ago now lol.. "This account is currently being transferred to another region. Try to log in to the appropriate region within five minutes." on LAN "This account is currently in the process of being transferred in from another region. Please try logging in again in five minutes." On NA... Help please... Waste of my saturday :(
